# SCNAntialiasingMode

**Enumeration**

Modes for antialiased rendering of the view’s scene, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SCNAntialiasingMode
```

## Constants

- **SCNAntialiasingMode.none**: Disables antialiased rendering.
- **SCNAntialiasingMode.multisampling2X**: Enables multisample antialiasing, with two samples per screen pixel.
- **SCNAntialiasingMode.multisampling4X**: Enables multisample antialiasing, with four samples per screen pixel.
- **SCNAntialiasingMode.multisampling8X**: Enables multisample antialiasing, with eight samples per screen pixel.
- **SCNAntialiasingMode.multisampling16X**: Enables multisample antialiasing, with sixteen samples per screen pixel.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring a View

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the view.
- **preferredFramesPerSecond**: The animation frame rate that the view uses to render its scene.
- **rendersContinuously**: A Boolean value that determines whether the view always renders at its preferred frame rate or only when its visible content changes.
- **antialiasingMode**: The antialiasing mode used for rendering the view’s scene.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
